content.query:
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_zomato
WITH
IDENTITY ='Managed Identity' 


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver
WITH
(
    LOCATION='https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/',
    CREDENTIAL= cred_zomato
)


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold
WITH
(
    LOCATION='https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/gold/',
    CREDENTIAL= cred_zomato
)


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

-- create external table
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extdata
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extdata1
WITH
(
    LOCATION= 'Merged_data',
    DATA_SOURCE= source_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * from gold.merged_data
